message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.CE, cs.NI 

This paper deals with the problem of non-intrusive load monitoring (NILM) or energy disaggregation, which involves disaggregating a household's electricity consumption into constituent appliances. This problem is related to several areas of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), control systems (cs.SY), information theory (cs.IT), computer engineering (cs.CE), and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). Given the focus on algorithmic approaches and the use of commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) power line communication (PLC) modems, the most likely categories are cs.LG and cs.SY, followed by cs.IT, cs.CE, and cs.NI.
